tool_description: Converts property addresses to geographic coordinates and standardizes address formatting using geocoding services.

addresses.description: Array of property addresses to geocode

country_code.description: Country code to help with geocoding accuracy

geocoding_service.description: Geocoding service to use (nominatim, google, mapbox)

rate_limit_delay.description: Delay in seconds between geocoding requests

error_messages: Empty addresses array: Provide at least one address to geocode.
Too many addresses: Maximum 100 addresses can be processed in one request.
Invalid country code: Use standard ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.
Geocoding service unavailable: Selected geocoding service is not responding.
Rate limit exceeded: Reduce rate_limit_delay or try again later.
Address not found: Some addresses could not be geocoded to coordinates.
usage: Provide an array of property addresses to convert to coordinates. Configure geocoding_service and rate_limit_delay based on your service limits.

geocoding_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each geocoding result (0-1)

failed_addresses.description: Array of addresses that could not be geocoded
